title: crashing game upon launch
body:
Hi,
ever since I changed my resolution settings inside of a game where my screen went black. (sound and spells working audibly, just not able to see anything on the screen). I tried closing the game and reloading but since I have been unable to launch games.
I immediately get a reconnect button that doesn't appear to be working. I checked the config folder and the resolution there is 1920x1080 matching my monitor. I Enabled windowed mode =1 in config but that doesn't seem to change anything.

Please advise.

replies.body: It sounds like you successfully connected to the game, but something is failing to render the match.  What happens if you try Alt+Enter to swap to windowed mode in-game?  I recommend going over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers and settings are in good health, which should restore the game.  I hope that helps!

I go straight to the reconnect button now,
I cant even launch a game.

My drivers are upto date, nothing is corrupted (i ran repair) 
settings are defaulted,
I tried running as admin and in compability mode

not sure what the problem is here

Thanks for the follow up!  Seems like a combination of stuff then, including failing to reach the game server now.  Use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, and try testing it in a custom game.

If the guides end up not helping, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you directly to figure out what's happening.
